heading: HR01496
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE TO INVESTIGATE, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, HOW THE ISIS WAS ABLE TO INFILTRATE AND RECRUIT FILIPINO-MUSLIMS BY THE LURE OF FINANCIAL GAIN, IN MARAWI AND MINDANAO, IN ORDER TO PROPOSE REMEDIAL MEASURES TO PREVENT SIMILAR MARAWI-INCIDENTS FROM RECURRING ANYWHERE IN THE ENTIRE COUNTRY BY ENSURING THAT ALL MONIES AND GRANTS FOR THE ECONOMIC AND OTHER FORMS OF REHABILITATION OF MARAWI SHALL BE PROPERLY AND EXPEDITIOUSLY UTILIZED
principal-authors: PAPANDAYAN, MAUYAG JR. "JUN" B.; DIMAPORO, MOHAMAD KHALID Q.;
status: Pending with the Committee on NATIONAL DEFENSE AND SECURITY since 2018-01-17
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01496
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE TO INVESTIGATE, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, HOW THE ISIS WAS ABLE TO INFILTRATE AND RECRUIT FILIPINO-MUSLIMS BY THE LURE OF FINANCIAL GAIN, IN MARAWI AND MINDANAO, IN ORDER TO PROPOSE REMEDIAL MEASURES TO PREVENT SIMILAR MARAWI-INCIDENTS FROM RECURRING ANYWHERE IN THE ENTIRE COUNTRY BY ENSURING THAT ALL MONIES AND GRANTS FOR THE ECONOMIC AND OTHER FORMS OF REHABILITATION OF MARAWI SHALL BE PROPERLY AND EXPEDITIOUSLY UTILIZED
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : PAPANDAYAN, MAUYAG JR. "JUN" B., DIMAPORO, MOHAMAD KHALID Q.
DATE FILED : 2017-11-29
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON NATIONAL DEFENSE AND SECURITY ON 2018-01-17
SECONDARILY REFERRED TO THE COMMITTEE(S) ON PUBLIC ORDER AND SAFETY
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2017-12-05;
